title: Community Tournament Hosting Business Startup
body:
Hey guys!

So recently I have been thinking about delving into hosting online tournaments. These will be held either weekly or a lead up to a monthly. 
My current aim is to try to fill the slot around where there isn't much happening in Oceania.

I have setup the brand and got the transition between matches for the stream made. 

I am looking for business partners or people who I would give shares to if they join now and are maintaining an active role in this startup.

So as it stands we would need:
Casters! (2 Position)
Tournament Admin (2 Position)
Producer that manages the stream (1 Position)
Graphic Designer (1 Position)
Social Media Person (1 Position)

Let me know in the comments if you are open or chuck me a PM!
